snippet: Armed raiders killed at least 38 villagers and burned more than 150 houses on Monday in the latest fighting between rival groups over land and water in Kenya’s coastal region.
abstract: Hundreds of armed raiders kill at least 38 villagers and burn more than 150 houses in the latest fighting between rival groups in a dispute over land and water in Kenya's coastal region.
lead_paragraph: Armed raiders killed at least 38 villagers and burned more than 150 houses on Monday in the latest fighting between rival groups over land and water in Kenya’s coastal region.

headline.main: Kenya: Clashes Over Land and Water Continue
headline.print_headline: Kenya: Clashes Over Land and Water Continue
